text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Equipment" includes all mechanisms that form part of or relate to vehicle equipment.

"Hazardous materials inspector" means a person who is assigned by the Department of the Environment and certified by the Department of State Police to perform an inspection authorized under this subtitle.

"Public Service Commission inspector" means a person who is assigned by the Public Service Commission and certified by the Department of State Police to perform an inspection authorized under this subtitle.

"State Police officer" means:
Any uniformed law enforcement officer of the Department of State Police; or
Any civilian employee of the Department of State Police assigned to enforce any rule or regulation adopted under this subtitle, but only while acting under written authorization of the Secretary of State Police.
